name: Arc (itch) (Creatively Bad)
description:
Description:

I have just started working on this idea and I am still messing around with what I want the game to be but feel free to check out what I've got so far!

Controls:

WASD / Left Joystick: Movement

Mouse / Right Joystick: Look

Space / Button South: Jump

Escape or P / Special Right: Pause

E / Button West: Interact

Left Mouse / Right Trigger: Hold Axe

Dev Info:

Engine: Unreal Engine

Art: Blender

Notes:
  • Controller doesn't work in menus
  • Customize button in menu doesn't do anything
  • If you choose to use a controller an Xbox controller is recommended
